references.paper_title: Video-mined task graphs for keystep recognition in instructional videos
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach of learning task graphs from video demonstrations, which is the main topic of the target paper.

references.paper_title: PREGO: online mistake detection in procedural egocentric videos
references.reason: This paper introduces a new benchmark for online mistake detection, which is the main downstream task evaluated in the target paper.

references.paper_title: My view is the best view: Procedure learning from egocentric videos
references.reason: This paper is among the first to introduce procedure learning from egocentric videos, which is a relevant topic to the target paper.

references.paper_title: United we stand, divided we fall: Unitygraph for unsupervised procedure learning from videos
references.reason: This paper proposes an unsupervised procedure learning method that is related to the approach in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Multimodal subtask graph generation from instructional videos
references.reason: This paper also addresses task graph learning from videos, providing a related and comparative approach.
